desc.p: OKAPI is trying to be as integrated with its Main Project Page as it can. This method retrieves basic information on a given issue from our project Issue Tracker (currently GitHub). In future, it might also return some of the latest comments (we're not yet sure if we want them displayed on our documentation pages).

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: id - number of the issue created for this method,
last_updated - date and time (ISO 8601) when the issue was last updated or null if unknown,
title - issue title or null if unknown,
url - URL of the issue page,
comment_count - total number of submitted comments or null if unknown.

returns.p: Note, that this might respond with HTTP 400 if we fail to retrieve data from GitHub.
